summary: Make Arngeir into what he always wanted to be. A determined young man brimming with JUSTICE. Or you can make him look like the guy from Witcher. Meh
descriptionHtml:
===========
Description
===========
What was that, Arngeir? You want to be an angsty teenaged warrior who can save the world? WELL TOO FRIGGIN\' BAD. But hey, with this mod, you can at least look close to one.

JRPG Arngeir!? WHAT? This possibly isn\'t as JRPG (KAWAIIDESU~OMG) as the others, so it could also be seen as younger Arngeir. Either way, it\'s pretty hilarious with his voice. Also, changed his robe to the monk garb so you could actually see his face.

You can thank Lobsel Vith for giving me this WONDERFUL and INGENIOUS challenge

================
Alternate Arngeir
================
I have also included a separate mod which kinda makes Arngeir look like the main character of Witcher with a beard. Please don\'t try to use this together with JRPG Arngeir, because that won\'t work. Sorry, no Teen Geralt Hero for you.

============
Requirements
============
1) ApachiiSkyHair for the hair:
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=10168

Note: You don\'t really need this next one. I just use it because it makes males look
better. I used the Younger Faces & Geonox version in my screenshots.

2) Better males - Beautiful nudes and faces - New hairstyles:
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=2488

============
Installation
============
Put both the esp and the bsa in your \\Skyrim\\Data folder. Hopefully, it should work fine.
If not, tell me and I\'ll try and fix it myself. This was a really quick job, so I expect
an issue or two.

=======
Credits
=======
Thanks to Apachii for the hairs, foretrenty for the npc editor, and Chris57 for the face
textures. I don\'t care what you do with this mod, but please respect the other guys.
author: yakusai
